    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtualMachine(android.content.Context context)
      Constructor - output will be added to log is debugVerbose is set - input will be attempted to be retrieved from the console System.in
      VirtualMachine(android.content.Context context, OutputListener outputListener, InputListener inputListener)
      Constructor Allows caller to pass in streams for both input and output If outputListener is null output will be added to log is debugVerbose is set If inputListener is null input will be attempted to be retrieved from the console System.in

      • runNextInstruction

        public boolean runNextInstruction()
                           throws VMError
        Will run the instruction the program pointer is pointing at. This is a synchronous call and will not call into the completedAddingInstructions
        Returns:
        instruction was a halt
        Throws:
        VMError - on a VM error

      • runInstructions

        public void runInstructions()
        Launches thread that does - Run all remaining instructions - starting from current program ptr location will call completedRunningInstructions on IVMListener after completion

      • runInstructions

        void runInstructions(int numInstructionsToRun)
        Launch thread that will Run N number of instructions - starting from current program ptr location will call completedRunningInstructions on IVMListener after completion
        Parameters:
        numInstructionsToRun - number of instructions to run until running stops
